name: Death Star Attack!
description:
A third person shooter created as the first part of the Game Dev course at Crimson Global Academy.  This course teaches Unity and C# coding to build 3D computer games.

This game, 'Death Star Attack!' is a homage to the iconic Star Wars Death Star scene.  Students at Crimson Global Academy learned how to control movement and shooting for the player, to control enemies using simple AI scripting, and to detect collisions between objects.

Use LEFT and RIGHT keys to turn - SPACE to fire.

Best viewed in full screen, and with volume set to MAXIMUM!

The game is under development and will be updated as the Game Dev course continues to work on it.
